website_summaries.verdict: A powerful enzymatic exfoliating mask treatment from a trusted brand.
pros: Uses aluminum oxide crystals, pumpkin enzymes, and an alpha hydroxy acid to leave skin radiant and smooth
Smells like pumpkin spice bread and doesn't leave a residue
cons: Some customers noticed a slight burning sensation during treatment

website_summaries.verdict: This luxury brand nearly rivals a professional chemical peel in terms of its ability to reveal rejuvenated skin.
pros: Thick in texture yet won't scratch your skin's vulnerable surface
Ingredients dissolve dirt and excess oil, revealing clean results that shine in a healthy way
Customers love the smell and the smooth results they see after wearing for only a short time
cons: Can feel a bit too powerful for some sensitive skin types and is best to test a small patch first

customer_reviews.title: Nothing compares to the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this is the original formula, I have the one I got from ulta and compared the product, it seems it doesn’t feel it has more pumpkin granules that is good for exfoliating the skin, I tried the original ptr on one side which is darker pumpkin color and you can see and feel the coarse granules against my skin and this one I bought from Amazon on the other side and it felt gel-like and very little granules on my skin and doesn’t seem to exfoliate very well. I’ll test it for a month and see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Beautylove2018

customer_reviews.title: Probably expired/overstock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from the vendor Fab Products and I believe it to be expired. I tried it, it wasn't working as well as I expected, so I ordered the same thing from Sephora. The mask from Sephora smelled more fresh, tingled more and had better results.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ingrassia

customer_reviews.title: Best peel ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used Peter Thomas Roth products in the past and this did not disappoint. I was using Philosophy Microdelivery Purifying Peel and while I loved it, I was looking for a less expensive alternative. This peel is amazing. I use it on both my face and decollete area. It smells yummy, has nice exfoliating grains and takes the dead and dry skin off. I think it helps to plump up and hydrate the skin. You get a good amount of product for the price. I will continue to buy and highly recommend to all the ladies who want radiant skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dimples

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fantastiic price
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product before and love it for exfoliating, without drying my face out. Was a little leary to purchase as it is so much cheaper than the salon I usually buy from, but no problem, the color and consistency are as they should be, and the added bonus was I was planning on buying from salon, but saw this and saved over $20!!
customer_reviews.author: oldbutcool

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! You can feel it tingling while you apply it. I cleanse my face first, then apply and gently scrub my face using light pressure and circular motions with my fingers. I concentrate a little longer on my nose and T zone area, where I get clogged pores. Then I leave it on for about 10 minutes and rinse off with warm water. Pat dry with a clean towel, and then apply my moisturizer. This scrub definitely works. My skin is much smoother and my pores look smaller already after using it only 3 times. Will reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lietz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask was pricey (in my opinion), but it was well worth the price. I typically use this mask 2-3 times per week and it leaves my skin looking soft and glowing. At first it burned a little, but the burning started to subside after two or three minutes. I have very sensitive skin and have several allergies, but I had no problems with this product. Also, this container will last me a long time. I have been consistently using it for a few months now and I've barely made a dent in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I do greatly enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: I do greatly enjoy this product. Amazon had it listed for significantly less than the local department store, so I decided to give the Amazon product a try. My Amazon ordered product seemed like it might be old or second quality. My Amazon ordered product still tingled a bit, but was darker in color and the smell was different/less strong than the department store product. The product bought from the local department store is more vivid in color (like the image shown).
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I get regular facials and have for years as I have very fair skin with lots of sun damage. Due to the lock down, I haven't been able to have a professional. My esthetician recommended this product as a gentle but effective way to exfoliate my skin myself. And was she ever right! I did leave it on for about 20 minutes - its not strong so there was no risk. I would highly recommend. My skin is glowing and pores minimized. Go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mask. It smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mask. It smells amazing, it clears out the skin beautifully, and it hasn't left any of the people I've used it on dry or uncomfortable after, which can often happen with this kind of mask. There is a little pinkness from the enzymes, but that usually goes away within 15 minutes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Iona Richards

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My mom gave me my first one of these. I used it in the shower everyday because I thought it was one of the cheap ones you bought it bath & body works. That's what the packaging looks like. I've struggled with acne for most of my life and this is the product I found that helps the most with that. I think it's a little pricey but for me it's worth it. I don't think it would be good for sensitive skin it's kind of abrasive and it tingles/Burns a little when you use it as a suggested 3 minute mask.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowers

customer_reviews.title: Expiring in one month
customer_reviews.text: I received this two days ago, turned the jar over and found the expiration date which is April 26, 2019. For a product with a shelf life of 3 years, this is definitely falling advertising a new product.
customer_reviews.author: RyAnne Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Insanely powerful mask AND scrub
customer_reviews.text: The formulation of this product is great in that you can use it as a mask or a scrub. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I've been using Retin-A and it really aggravated my already red, dry face. My intent was to minimize the mechanical "de-flaking" of my dry skin in hopes of a nice enzyme peel, but it's got a real kick. This would be great for anyone who isn't already using another product, but if you have sensitive skin, compounding the enzyme action in this product with another may be too much for you.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Fake product. Seal tape on box tampered.
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to using this mask. As soon as I opened the saw the box I noticed right away the seal tape was tampered. I have used many high end product in the past and have never noticed it packaged like this one using a dirty tape and dust covered box. I am returning the mask and getting an authentic one from some trustworthy place like Sephora. This was never the case on Amazon a couple of years ago of getting fake branded products. It’s sad to see Amazon might be heading towards eBay route. In trying to give deals the quality of the product is compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Ashi

customer_reviews.title: This one is just as good as the spa pumpkin mask
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOVE this mask. I recently purchased this mask so i could do pumpkin masks at home verse going to a spa and always getting them done. This one is just as good as the spa pumpkin mask. It does burn a little the first minute it is on, but the burning goes away. Any good strong, acidic mask is going to burn. It helped to take a lot of dead skin i had off and pumpkin masks always even out my skin tone. Important to put on sunscreen when in the sun after any mask or product that exfoliates so well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: pumpkin pie
customer_reviews.text: my dermatologist recommended an expensive pumpkin enzyme mask, i remembered that PTR had a similar mask (it’s the exact same mask just a different brand), i went to sephora in person and it was $60, i was bummed! found it on here for $30!! and it smells SO good, like pumpkin pie. and has micro scrubbing in it but not plastic beads.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love PTR products. My esthetician recommended for my skin that I use a fruit enzyme rather than any other type of enzyme so I was excited when I found this product. It’s less expensive than on Sephora or PTR’s product but it is an official and legit product. It smells absolutely delicious. My skin is very prone to break outs but I haven’t had any sort of reaction to this mask. I will say if you have sensitive skin that it does tend to burn at first but it does fade away. This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something that works as well as Exfolikate without costing $85 for 2 ounces. Well, this ain’t it. My skin is the opposite of sensitive and I felt no tingle/burn like I experienced with Exfolikate. Didn’t really notice a difference after I used it. In case you’re wondering (as I often do when I see reviews like this), no, I don’t work for Exfolikate.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainman

customer_reviews.title: favorite exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this exfoliator! Buying Peter Thomas Roth on Amazon is the way to go! Ulta sells this exfoliating mask for $60!!! SO the savings are real here. My product arrived in brand new condition, and appears to be completely genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using the mask. I always use the Peter Thomas Roth Peel and Reveal exfoliating scrub which I love. I now use them both, alternating days. The mask leaves my face smooth and glowing. It tingles a bit when first applied but quickly goes away. It's a thick salve like texture. Goes on nicely and doesn't drip, stays put. These products would be on my Dash Button for me!! I can't say enough good things. P.S. I think I would buy them for the heavenly smell alone! It's like Autumn in a jar.
customer_reviews.author: soccermom2

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: Was gifted this product and I was reluctant to use it because I don’t like pumpkin anything. Used it anyway and it burned like fire (at first). BUT it was worth it! I use twice per week for the longest time recommended and it makes my skin so soft. Will never NOT use this product ever again. It’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I love how this makes my skin look and feel afterwards
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my skin look and feel afterwards, but it is a bit painful when it's on my face. I have to build up my tolerance in order to leave it on for 7 min. The smell is more like actual pumpkin instead of a pleasant pumpkin pie. If you can get past the smell and the pain, this would be a great mask.
customer_reviews.author: Mariko

customer_reviews.title: This is my weekly yummy face treat
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, what a lovely mask! Even before you put it on, the wonderful pumpkin scent fills the air. I find the scent quite delicious. Now, for me, once on my face, I definitely feel a bit of tingling and, I'm not sure how to say describe it -- maybe a burning feeling? It was nothing bad or overwhelming, but I did noticed it at first then it it faded. I leave it on usually for 20 minutes. Afterward, my face is so smooth and bright. I use this once a week and really do enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Made my face red and blotchy
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have no allergies to pumpkin. Immediately after using this product my face became hot, irritated and blotchy with red spots. I've never had a product irritate my skin so much. I'm angry I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Westly Sirois

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I have several PTR masks. This is one of my favorites. First off, it smells like pie. Next, it really does a great job of exfoliating and resurfacing your skin to give you that glow everyone craves. I use it more frequently in the winter. I use it with a facial steamer to get the best results. This mask is definitely a staple in my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have sensitive skin, but it has been gentle enough. Recently been struggling with dry skin and acne. It works great to help remove dry, dull layers. Seems to be helping with clearing my skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Effective mask.
customer_reviews.text: Found this at a good value on Amazon. I’m always weary of getting counterfeit or old products but this was the real deal. I’ve purchased this mask at full retail before so I can tell it’s the same product. This does a nice job of exfoliating and leaving the skin brighter and clearer. It does tingle which I don’t have a problem with.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Probably good for sensitive skin, but didn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been breaking out like crazy this past summer, and I thought I'd give this well reviewed mask a try to help clarify my skin and minimize scarring. (For some general background: My skin is oily, with congested pores and most of my acne tends to be close to the surface.) Overall I do like this mask, it smells AMAZING and my skin does feel nice afterwards, but for me it was a little too gentle. I'll probably still use it every once in a while, but it's definitely not a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using PTR anti-aging face wash for 10 years. I love all of his products, but this mask is my favorite! Quick and easy to use (I've incorporated it into my K-beauty routine) and leaves my face smooth & glowing. I have combo skin with old acne scaring and slight texture issues. This mask goes a long way to smoothing my skins texture and fading marks. I've been using for 3 months 1-2 times a week and I still have so much left. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: EmmiK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and I love this product. It cleans and softens my skin. Everyone is different, so just leave it on based on your skin sensitivity level.
customer_reviews.author: dap

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious and it works!
customer_reviews.text: First if all, this smells like a delicious dessert! I am 62 years young and have the typical mouth lines and crows feet yada yada. I used the product for the first time last night, and I loved it! My skin looks and feels so smooth and my wrinkles are not as pronounced. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: chickchick

customer_reviews.title: The price DOUBLED!! :(
customer_reviews.text: We've used this product for years and love it. But the price is doubled now, so we won't purchase any more. Very disappointed. Why???? The product and ingredients are still the same, so I have to assume the seller is just trying to pocket $30 more per jar than before. We'll have to find a reasonably priced alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've ordered this product fairly regularly
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's smells like pumpkin pie and it makes my skin feel fabulous. I'm not even sure how or if it really works but my skin looks beautiful even at the age of 45 and having battled breast cancer twice. (Chemo did a number on my skin)
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not wow
customer_reviews.text: The effects of this mask are temporary. I use it twice a week as directed. My skin feels very smooth and soft for a couple of hours and it's good for using serums and moisturizers afterwards but no long-term effects or improvements that make me want to buy it again for that price. I will go back to using the Ahava masks I was using.
customer_reviews.author: KayH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My Esthetician used this during my facials recommending it highly. I do too. It's easy to apply and makes the skin tingle. It leaves the complexion freshened and revived. I feel like i've got my money's worth using it.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Not if you expect a dramatic change but it does brighten appearance
customer_reviews.author: sabrina benson

customer_reviews.title: Great peel(not abrasive or aggressive)
customer_reviews.text: Always warn people with sensitive skin that they may feel a tingle. This is a chemical peel and exfoliant. So you do feel it. But it is gentle. I have sensitive skin and it works great on myself or people I do facials on
customer_reviews.author: Sannymakeupfx

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Repeat do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this is expired!!! came in a dusty beat up package not properly sealed in any way DO NOT BUY! I never leave reviews but be warned ! No stars
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Banfor

customer_reviews.title: Very pumpkin smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells like fresh pumpkin and nice small crystals to scrub face with- seems a bit drying or maybe its just my dry skin. Its more expensive than my usually scrub and not sure it works better than dept store scrub for exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Powerful peeling mask - works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great powerful skin peel. It stings when I apply it, but does not leave my skin red. Because it's powerful, I can't use it more than a couple of times a week, less often in hot or very cold weather. This mask really does leave my skin smoother. I will repurchase when I run out because I can tell a difference. Added bonus - has a great pumpkin smell.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not a rip off, this is the good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great for an at home facial. Did not have any problems with the product itself though I did experience a slight tingling sensation. Also, I've used the product, previously bought on Sephora. The Sephora product costed me a LOT more and I can confidently say that the Amazon product was not a rip off. I wonder how there could be such a huge price difference.
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: Just what your skin needsto get glowing
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders and has the yummy pumpkin smell as well. I use it 2-3 times a week. This is my third jar, and I can't see myself using anything else. My skin looks poreless and refined.
customer_reviews.author: camilla

customer_reviews.title: This is the best face mask out there hands down
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face mask out there hands down. It combines the power of a glycolic peel with that of a skin brightener. I use this Every other day and wake up with glowing skin. My acne scars also become lighter with every use.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Premium product
customer_reviews.text: Premium product. It helps plump the skin just enough to decrease wrinkles. This project is the real deal! I love this pumpkin peel I keep it in my fridge. It will be my new staple four facial regimen.
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: nice product, more of a mask / scrub
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of Sephora, nice product, more of a mask / scrub, very tingly at first but makes skin soft. I tried the trial size first in the Peter Roth Kit. This 5 oz tub will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Butts

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, not for for me though.
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great. Product smells and feels good. I didn’t see a change in my skin when using a few times a week. I really wanted to love this, but just didn’t. I usually love PTR products. I won’t buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great! But don't apply it immediately after washing your face. I did and thought my face was on fire. It was unbearable in less than a minute. But I've used it often since but not after using warm water first, and found that to be fine. It's a lovely product that leaves your skin feeling soft,smooth, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: RIP. OFF. !
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT THE ORIGINAL PTR FORMULA. The color and consistency are very wrong. SOOO disappointed and a bit ticked. I feel robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: love love the pumpkin scent
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this scrub...it's very mild and cleanses well. Leaving this on for approximately 5-10 mins to soak into the skin makes my face fell & look best. I am happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizzabeth Davila

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark spots/hyperpigmentation.
customer_reviews.text: I am A Black woman & I have sensitive skin, I used this sparingly and in intervals. In order to avoid getting a chemical burn. I loved the coarseness of the mask, it makes for a great exfoliator. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great Exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this from Peter Thomas Roth, and I really liked it. You can really feel a difference in your skin ! It is softer and smoother, and really smells good. It will go along way since it doesn't take very much. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Culver

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for selling my favorite mask at half the cost of the beauty stores!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite face mask, the fact that it's a scrub makes it that much better. Multipurpose facial tool with the most amazing pumpkin spice scent. I use it year round, and I love how soft my face feels after I use it. Thank you for selling it at such a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Watty Watts

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulously
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It very much does resurface the face well. I had a few blemishes and a I have dry skin. This stuff worked like a charm. My face now has a nice glow and for a middle aged broad that is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is actually the real deal but it smells amazing. I can feel my face tingling when I use this. I keep it in the shower and use once a week while I'm in there!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I liked the amount of product I got for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the amount of product I got for the price, I liked that it went on evenly and that it had microbeads at first. But I noticed that although it might've exfoliated my skin it didn't add any other benefits that I saw with Skin Obsessions pumpkin peel. Skin Obsessions peel goes on uneven, but it leaves my skin feeling moisturized and brighter. This doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Zuza

customer_reviews.title: Great product but DOUBLED in price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve been purchasing this for 3+ years but now it has DOUBLED in price from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren U.

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date was scratched off!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to do anything. No tingling, burning,... nothing. Looked at the bottom of the jar for the expiration date (as I heard others had received an expired product) and I can see evidence on someone removing the expiration date! So it was definitely sold expired purposefully!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... change in my skin tone which gets tanned very easily.. the instructions do not mention how long ...
customer_reviews.text: i did not see any significant change in my skin tone which gets tanned very easily .. the instructions do not mention how long should the product be massaged onto the face before leaving it on. it's a 1 time purchase for me
customer_reviews.author: nm654321

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: love this. smells wonderful, feels great. I use it twice a week and have recommended it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true product
customer_reviews.text: I started with the gift pack sizes of these masks and this mask stood out above all the others. So I ordered the big size. This mask totally works and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Bowens

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my face feeling so soft and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Peter Thomas Roth product. My skin feels so smooth and fresh after using the pumpkin mask, as well as appear bright and vibrant. You only need a small amount, so the 5 oz container will last a while, even with my wife and I using it several times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Exfoliates with out to much scrubbing due to The enzymes. Dose not leave dryness
customer_reviews.author: dbull

customer_reviews.title: Best mask
customer_reviews.text: Good for evening skin tone, smells amazing, and a little goes a long way! Best price for this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Pumpkin enzyme and scrub works great. Gentle and effective. Leaving on 3 minutes worked best for me. I have combination oily and dry skin, with rosacea. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I’ve used this for several years and it truly brightens your skin. The scent is comforting like pumpkin pie. Love it and can’t recommend it enough
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works  pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 45 year old guy, that was told to try an enzyme mask. Burns a bit, the first time, so don't leave the mask on too long. My skin is not that sensitive either... I do twice a week and it really does help.
customer_reviews.author: JB Caring Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: It's a good mask. I was hoping for a pumpkin smell, but it has more of a chemical smell. I still use it. It can be strong, so if you have sensitive skin, be leery.
customer_reviews.author: MPTT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I switch between this and the Anadalou Pumpkin Mask. Very refreshing and instant results.
customer_reviews.author: groovyfashionmonster

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Enzyme Mask
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Exactly for smoothing skin and clearing pores this product last a long time so the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty_TX

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mask ever. Smells like pumpkin and Stings so good. The scrub aspect leaves you feeling clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlovinmomma

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS PUMPKIN MASK
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how much lower this costs than on Sephora. I love the mask. It stung a bit at first but my skin got used to it in like a minute. It scared me at first but was absolutely FINE! No adverse reactions and my skin felt good. This smells like pumpkin pie. I mentioned it in my blog post here: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Kimandmakeup

customer_reviews.title: Omg i am just in LOVE with this mask
customer_reviews.text: Omg i am just in LOVE with this mask. My face is silky smooth after.. and it really brightens my skin. I use it 3 times a week and keep it on for 20-30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: cyril smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: It does burn at first (not too bad) but it goes away pretty fast. This product is great and leaves my skin feeling soo smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissytina

customer_reviews.title: Mold/mildew on box
customer_reviews.text: This product was very old as the box was stained with mold. It also had little strength left to it. I am sending back.
customer_reviews.author: lisa hanson

customer_reviews.title: Such a good price, but dirty
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I purchased the sample pack of this brand's masks from Sephora and was so obsessed with the pumpkin mask that I had to get a full size. Was happy to find it at such a good price compared to the store. Yes, my box was a little bit dented around the corners and dusty which makes me think they had it stored in a random place that I doubt had good climate control...and there is no way to tell if it had been opened or the seal inside just fell into the product... But that's what you get when you order the cheaper box :-)
customer_reviews.author: Darci loves shopping

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff clears my skin right up. Use it once a week for 7 to 10 minutes. Any scarring I had faded quickly. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My go to peel. Been using this for years. The smell is awesome and it really sloughs off the dead skin. Leaves the skin refreshed. My skin is slightly sensitive and I have no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard that it has irritated some people's skin the next day... which is normal for an enzyme mask!!!! Consider it a light chemical peel. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Michaella

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Very pricy product but it works great for controlling acne. It is going to be the next tide pod trend though since this smells just like thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good Smoothing Mask
customer_reviews.text: Such a good mask. I use it on my clients October and November. It smells just like pumpkin pie and soothes the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ertell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from a non PTR seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product from Salon’s Choice and thought it did an OK job so far so I bought another one off Amazon but from Peter Thomas Roth for a friend. Compared it side by side, the one from Salon’s Choice was much darker than PTR... Didn’t try the PTR one but just skeptical of my product now...
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rambo

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start with the smell OMG !! Super yummy smelling . I want to eat it (not really ) but omg yummmm. And it works so good . I got a sample from Sephora just because it smelt so good and I fell in love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes my skin feel. Also smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Authentic product
customer_reviews.text: Authentic enzyme peel. Use scrub gently and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MD.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR DRY SKIN!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I have terribly dry skin and it needs a lot of exfoliation. My skin has looked so much better after using this once a week. Smells incredible! like pumpkin pie. Its a lot of money but its worth it and it cost a lot more at Sephora and Ulta. I did get a sample from Sephora and tried it before purchasing here. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M Noble

customer_reviews.title: NICE! Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: NICE! Love the scent! I've been using Retin-A/trentinoin cream for about 6 months now. This helps to reduce the peeling and flaking that occurs, but I don't use it everyday because it is a bit abrasive. Let it sit on your skin for a while to allow the enzymes to work. Scrub gently at the end and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Siggy

customer_reviews.title: It's like the best parts of Thanksgiving on your face without the crazy calories.
customer_reviews.text: Kept it in my cart for about a month until the price dropped to the mid $30's. Love love LOVE it. My friend gave me a combo mask pack during christmas and this just smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Vrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice so far, no bad reaction, I was expecting more tingling as per reviews but did not do much to me. Face was really clear when i woke up but not sure if is that or if is the all new regimen i used that night.
customer_reviews.author: WomenExperiences

customer_reviews.title: Devine
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite masks and I have quite a few from PTR and others. It doesn't irritate my über sensitive skin. Makes my skin glow.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mason

customer_reviews.title: I want to eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it works, don't see a difference in my skin but who ever does. Seriously I want to eat it, it smells so good, but there are definitely metallic flakes in there so I'm going to hold off for now.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: The only face product I need. All in one!
customer_reviews.text: Great exfoliate! Face looks smooth and polished. The enzymes keep my oil glands at a normal level... Prevents blackheads in my T Zone from forming.
customer_reviews.author: BGRLZRK

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail product
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle mask. Didn't burn much at all and after I took it off my blackheads and white heads were surfaced and extremely easy to remove. My skin is decongested, brighter and smoother. Amazing product and it comes with a lot for how much you have to use for a treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Colten

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years! Love it. Leaves your skin feeling soft, bright and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Fig

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First product Ive used from this line and I am happy with the purchase. It burns soI know its working...hehe :) Activate the AHAs by rubbing in circles and you're left with smooth skin
customer_reviews.author: yyasssssmeeee4

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!!! My skin is so soft and looks so clear after each use. I have to force myself not to use it everyday. Doesn't irritate or break out my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Millz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff and cheaper here than in the big makeup store. Scrubs the dead and dull right off. Not for overly sensitive skin tho.
customer_reviews.author: Juquatta

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I first tried this in a mini jar that was part of a set from Sephora and decided that it was a must have item. It works as a great facial scrub, makes your skin feel fresh and clearer with regular use, and smells like pumpkin pie. I use this once weekly as part of my skin care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing & works well too
customer_reviews.text: I loooove the smell of this mask! I use it every week for 10 mins and have been doing so for a few months and I’ve def seen an noticeable difference in my skin’s texture and clarity. It’s smoother, softer and my pores are less congested.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for smooth, soft skin!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the best price I have seen for this is here on Amazon. I have sensitive skin but have had no problems with this mask. It leaves my skin feeling very smooth and soft. It is a good exfoliator. Besides by face, I have used this on my arms where I have some aging. It leaves my arms feeling much better and takes off some of the extra layer of aging skin. A little bit goes a long way so one does not need to pile it on-just a light layer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful winter scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to winter scrub. It keeps my skin fresh and clear and bright.
customer_reviews.author: xtyball

customer_reviews.title: great stuff. Leaves my skin baby smooth
customer_reviews.text: Wow! great stuff. Leaves my skin baby smooth, spots lightened up, deeply moisturizing too, and smell out of this world.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

product_meta.title: Pumpkin Enzyme Mask Enzymatic Dermal Resurfacer, Exfoliating Pumpkin Facial Mask for Dullness, Fine Lines, Wrinkles and Uneven Skin Tone
product_meta.description:
This powerful mask helps address the appearance of a dull, aging complexion in three ways: by exfoliating with Pumpkin Enzyme, peeling with Alpha Hydroxy Acid and polishing with Aluminum Oxide Crystals. Helps even and clarify the appearance of skin tone and smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal skin that appears smoother, younger, radiant and revitalized. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

BRAND STORY
An influential segment leader in the beauty industry, Peter Thomas Roth corners the clinical market as a groundbreaking, results-focused innovator committed to his brand philosophy: Breakthrough formulas. Astonishing results.
